transformations.name: MapOrdersMonthly
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapOrders
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapCategory
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapEmployees
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapOrderDetails
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapTerretories
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapTerritoriesEmployee
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapSuppliers
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapProducts
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	month_p as integer (7),
	year_p as integer (1996)
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/products/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> categorySource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/categories/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> employeesSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionRootPath: 'prepared/orders',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/orders/**/**/**/*parquet')]) ~> ordersSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/orderDetails/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> orderDetailsSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/territories/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> terretoriesSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/employeeTerritories/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> employeeTerretoriesSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/suppliers/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> supplierSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/employees/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> productsSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionRootPath: 'prepared/orders',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('prepared/orders/year=' + toString($year_p) + '/month=' + toString($month_p) + '/**/*parquet')]) ~> orderMonthlySource
SelectCategory derive(key = crc32(512,category_id,category_name),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeyCategory
MapCategory select(mapColumn(
		category_id = CategoryID,
		category_name = CategoryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCategory
MapEmployees select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		BirthDate,
		HireDate,
		Address,
		City,
		Region,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		ReportsTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployee
MapOrders select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrders
MapOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		ProductID,
		Quantity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrderDetails
SelectEmployee aggregate(groupBy(ReportsTo),
	workerCounts = countDistinct(EmployeeID)) ~> AggregateDistinctReportTo
AggregateDistinctReportTo filter(!isNull(ReportsTo)) ~> FilterReportToNotNull
finSelectDimSupervisor derive(key = crc32(512,employee_key),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeySupervisor
finSelectDimEmployee derive(key = crc32(512,last_name,first_name,birth_date,hire_date,address,city,region,postal_code,country),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeyEmployee
SelectEmployeeID, SelectJoinOrders join(SelectEmployeeID@EmployeeID == SelectJoinOrders@EmployeeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpOrders
SelectOrders, AggregateTotalProducts join(SelectOrders@OrderID == AggregateTotalProducts@OrderID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTotalProducts
JoinTotalProducts select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = SelectOrders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		year,
		month,
		OrderID = AggregateTotalProducts@OrderID,
		total_products
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectJoinOrders
MapTerretories select(mapColumn(
		TerritoryID,
		RegionID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTerretories
MapTerritoriesEmployee select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID,
		TerritoryID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmpTerretories
SelectEmpTerretories, SelectTerretories join(SelectEmpTerretories@TerritoryID == SelectTerretories@TerritoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTerretories
JoinTerretories select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID,
		TerritoryID = SelectEmpTerretories@TerritoryID,
		RegionID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectJoinTerretories
SelectEmployeeJoin, SelectJoinTerretories join(SelectEmployeeJoin@EmployeeID == SelectJoinTerretories@EmployeeID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpTerrReg
JoinEmpTerrReg select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID = SelectEmployeeJoin@EmployeeID,
		OrderID,
		total_products,
		TerritoryID,
		RegionID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectJoinedOrders
SelectJoinedOrders aggregate(groupBy(EmployeeID),
	total_orders = count(OrderID),
		total_products = sum(total_products),
		total_distinct_territories = countDistinct(TerritoryID),
		total_distinct_regions = countDistinct(RegionID)) ~> AggregateEmployee
finSelectFactEmployee derive(key = crc32(512, employee_key),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeyAggEmployee
MapSuppliers select(mapColumn(
		supplier_id = SupplierID,
		company_name = CompanyName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSupplier
SelectSupplier derive(key = crc32(512,supplier_id,company_name),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeySupplier
MapProducts select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		SupplierID,
		CategoryID,
		UnitsInStock
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProducts
SelectOrderDetails aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	times_ordered = sum(Quantity)) ~> AggregateTimesOrdered
SelectProducts, AggregateTimesOrdered join(SelectProducts@ProductID == AggregateTimesOrdered@ProductID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
SelectProductsJoin derive(key = crc32(512,product_id),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeyProducts
SelectEmployee select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployeeID
JoinEmpOrders select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID = SelectEmployeeID@EmployeeID,
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		year,
		month,
		total_products
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployeeJoin
JoinSupplierKey select(mapColumn(
		product_id = SelectProducts@ProductID,
		units_in_stock = UnitsInStock,
		times_ordered,
		category_key,
		supplier_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductsJoin
orderMonthlySource derive(OrderID = toInteger(byName('OrderID')),
		CustomerID = toString(byName('CustomerID')),
		EmployeeID = toInteger(byName('EmployeeID')),
		OrderDate = toTimestamp(byName('OrderDate')),
		RequiredDate = toTimestamp(byName('RequiredDate')),
		ShippedDate = toTimestamp(byName('ShippedDate')),
		ShipVia = toInteger(byName('ShipVia')),
		Freight = toDecimal(byName('Freight')),
		ShipName = toString(byName('ShipName')),
		ShipAddress = toString(byName('ShipAddress')),
		ShipCity = toString(byName('ShipCity')),
		ShipRegion = toString(byName('ShipRegion')),
		ShipPostalCode = toString(byName('ShipPostalCode')),
		ShipCountry = toString(byName('ShipCountry')),
		year = toInteger(byName('year')),
		month = toInteger(byName('month'))) ~> MapOrdersMonthly
ordersSource derive(OrderID = toInteger(byName('OrderID')),
		CustomerID = toString(byName('CustomerID')),
		EmployeeID = toInteger(byName('EmployeeID')),
		OrderDate = toTimestamp(byName('OrderDate')),
		RequiredDate = toTimestamp(byName('RequiredDate')),
		ShippedDate = toTimestamp(byName('ShippedDate')),
		ShipVia = toInteger(byName('ShipVia')),
		Freight = toDecimal(byName('Freight')),
		ShipName = toString(byName('ShipName')),
		ShipAddress = toString(byName('ShipAddress')),
		ShipCity = toString(byName('ShipCity')),
		ShipRegion = toString(byName('ShipRegion')),
		ShipPostalCode = toString(byName('ShipPostalCode')),
		ShipCountry = toString(byName('ShipCountry')),
		year = toInteger(byName('year')),
		month = toInteger(byName('month'))) ~> MapOrders
MapOrdersMonthly select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrdersMonthly
SelectOrdersMonthly, SelectOrderDetails join(SelectOrdersMonthly@OrderID == SelectOrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrderDetails
SelectOrderDetails aggregate(groupBy(OrderID),
	total_products = sum(Quantity)) ~> AggregateTotalProducts
JoinOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = SelectOrdersMonthly@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		year,
		month,
		OrderID = SelectOrderDetails@OrderID,
		ProductID,
		Quantity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectJoinOrdersMonthly
SelectEmployeeID, SelectJoinOrdersMonthly join(SelectEmployeeID@EmployeeID == SelectJoinOrdersMonthly@EmployeeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpOrdersMonthly
JoinEmpOrdersMonthly select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID = SelectEmployeeID@EmployeeID,
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		RequiredDate,
		ShippedDate,
		ShipVia,
		year,
		month,
		ProductID,
		Quantity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployeeJoinMonthly
SelectEmployeeJoinMonthly aggregate(groupBy(EmployeeID),
	total_products = sum(Quantity),
		total_distinct_products = countDistinct(ProductID),
		total_orders = count(OrderID)) ~> AggregateEmployeeMonthly
finSelectFactEmpMonthly derive(key = crc32(512,employee_key,year,month),
		created_ts = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddKeyAggEmpMonthly
JoinEmployeeKeyFactEmpMonth derive(year = $year_p,
		month = $month_p) ~> AddMonthYear
FilterReportToNotNull select(mapColumn(
		employee_id = ReportsTo,
		num_employees_directly_supervised = workerCounts
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSupervisor
AddKeyEmployee select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeID = employee_id,
		key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployeeKey
SelectSupervisor, SelectEmployeeKey join(employee_id == EmployeeID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmployeeKeyDimSup
AggregateEmployeeMonthly, SelectEmployeeKey join(AggregateEmployeeMonthly@EmployeeID == SelectEmployeeKey@EmployeeID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmployeeKeyFactEmpMonth
AggregateEmployee, SelectEmployeeKey join(AggregateEmployee@EmployeeID == SelectEmployeeKey@EmployeeID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmployeeKeyFactEmp
JoinEmployeeKeyFactEmp select(mapColumn(
		num_orders_affiliated = total_orders,
		num_products_affiliated = total_products,
		total_distinct_territories,
		total_distinct_regions,
		employee_key = key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finSelectFactEmployee
AddMonthYear select(mapColumn(
		total_products,
		total_distinct_products,
		total_orders,
		employee_key = key,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finSelectFactEmpMonthly
JoinEmployeeKeyDimSup select(mapColumn(
		num_employees_directly_supervised,
		employee_key = key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finSelectDimSupervisor
AddKeySupplier select(mapColumn(
		supplier_id,
		supplier_key = key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSupplierKey
AddKeyCategory select(mapColumn(
		category_id,
		category_key = key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCategoryKey
JoinProducts, SelectCategoryKey join(CategoryID == category_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCategoryKey
JoinCategoryKey, SelectSupplierKey join(SupplierID == supplier_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSupplierKey
SelectEmployee select(mapColumn(
		employee_id = EmployeeID,
		last_name = LastName,
		first_name = FirstName,
		birth_date = BirthDate,
		hire_date = HireDate,
		address = Address,
		city = City,
		region = Region,
		postal_code = PostalCode,
		country = Country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finSelectDimEmployee
categorySource derive(CategoryID = toInteger(byName('CategoryID')),
		CategoryName = toString(byName('CategoryName')),
		Description = toString(byName('Description')),
		Picture = toBinary(byName('Picture'))) ~> MapCategory
employeesSource derive(EmployeeID = toInteger(byName('EmployeeID')),
		LastName = toString(byName('LastName')),
		FirstName = toString(byName('FirstName')),
		Title = toString(byName('Title')),
		TitleOfCourtesy = toString(byName('TitleOfCourtesy')),
		BirthDate = toTimestamp(byName('BirthDate')),
		HireDate = toTimestamp(byName('HireDate')),
		Address = toString(byName('Address')),
		City = toString(byName('City')),
		Region = toString(byName('Region')),
		PostalCode = toString(byName('PostalCode')),
		Country = toString(byName('Country')),
		HomePhone = toString(byName('HomePhone')),
		Extension = toString(byName('Extension')),
		Photo = toBinary(byName('Photo')),
		Notes = toString(byName('Notes')),
		ReportsTo = toInteger(byName('ReportsTo')),
		PhotoPath = toString(byName('PhotoPath'))) ~> MapEmployees
orderDetailsSource derive(OrderID = toInteger(byName('OrderID')),
		ProductID = toInteger(byName('ProductID')),
		UnitPrice = toDecimal(byName('UnitPrice')),
		Quantity = toInteger(byName('Quantity')),
		Discount = toFloat(byName('Discount'))) ~> MapOrderDetails
terretoriesSource derive(TerritoryID = toString(byName('TerritoryID')),
		TerritoryDescription = toString(byName('TerritoryDescription')),
		RegionID = toInteger(byName('RegionID'))) ~> MapTerretories
employeeTerretoriesSource derive(EmployeeID = toInteger(byName('EmployeeID')),
		TerritoryID = toString(byName('TerritoryID'))) ~> MapTerritoriesEmployee
supplierSource derive(SupplierID = toInteger(byName('SupplierID')),
		CompanyName = toString(byName('CompanyName')),
		ContactName = toString(byName('ContactName')),
		ContactTitle = toString(byName('ContactTitle')),
		Address = toString(byName('Address')),
		City = toString(byName('City')),
		Region = toString(byName('Region')),
		PostalCode = toString(byName('PostalCode')),
		Country = toString(byName('Country')),
		Phone = toString(byName('Phone')),
		Fax = toString(byName('Fax')),
		HomePage = toString(byName('HomePage'))) ~> MapSuppliers
productsSource derive(ProductID = toInteger(byName('ProductID')),
		ProductName = toString(byName('ProductName')),
		SupplierID = toInteger(byName('SupplierID')),
		CategoryID = toInteger(byName('CategoryID')),
		QuantityPerUnit = toString(byName('QuantityPerUnit')),
		UnitPrice = toDecimal(byName('UnitPrice')),
		UnitsInStock = toInteger(byName('UnitsInStock')),
		UnitsOnOrder = toInteger(byName('UnitsOnOrder')),
		ReorderLevel = toInteger(byName('ReorderLevel')),
		Discontinued = toBoolean(byName('Discontinued'))) ~> MapProducts
AddKeyCategory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCategory
AddKeySupervisor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkSupervisor
AddKeyEmployee sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkEmployeeDim
AddKeyAggEmployee sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkFactEmployee
AddKeySupplier sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkSupplier
AddKeyProducts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkProduct
AddKeyAggEmpMonthly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkFactEmployeeMonthly

parameters{
	year_p as integer (1996),
	month_p as integer (7),
	day_p as integer (15)
}
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersTable
FilterRows derive(year = year(OrderDate),
		month = month(OrderDate),
		day = dayOfMonth(OrderDate),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month,
		day
	)) ~> DerivedColumnYearMonthDay
OrdersTable filter(coalesce(ShippedDate, OrderDate)==toTimestamp(toString($month_p) + '/' + toString($day_p) + '/' + toString($year_p), 'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> FilterRows
DerivedColumnYearMonthDay sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrdersParquet
